products.title: Honeycomb Teal - Roman Blind
products.description: To give a big pop of colour to your home, consider the honeycomb in teal. This rich canvas of dark and light teal tones, with honeycomb shapes filled with daisies, offers a strikingly abstract look that you're sure to love. Use the teal to liven up a bright white study or home office, adding a little inspiration as you get down to work. Accent the colours of the fabric with matching teal hues in the form of ornaments and oddments, going for ice white and contemporary furniture.

products.title: Honeycomb Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: An unusual blind with fascinating patterning, the honeycomb navy features a subtle honeycomb patterning filled with abstract daisies, all in deep navy, mustard, and white tones. You'll love the contemporary feel to this blind, blending nature with abstract in one fell swoop. Use the navy for a cosy feel to a den or sitting room, filling the room with wooden furniture and matching navy tones. Use a gentle white paint for the walls, and highlight with mustard tones in your oddments and wall art.

products.title: Marseille Oatmeal Roman Blind
products.description: Their marseille range is a set of wonderful roman blinds in soft colours that will give the room a unique look. This beautiful cream roman blind with a nice texture will add a touch of elegance to your room. Product id: db-arom0833 fabric colour: oatmeal material: 54% viscose 46% polyester headrail: white metal headrail control type: sidewinder chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes marseille oatmeal roman blind in cream.

products.title: William Morris Sunflower Honey Roman Blind
products.description: A true william morris showstopper, the sunflower design is still as beautiful now as when it was first designed in 1879. Part of their collaboration with the v&a, the sunflower honey roman blind is a great choice if you want to replicate a warm summer's day in your home. Th a true william morris showstopper, the sunflower design is still as beautiful now as when it was first designed in 1879.

products.title: Nova Oatmeal - Roman Blind
products.description: The soft beige of the nova oatmeal creates a gorgeously subtle neutral that will work with a wide range of colour and decor schemes. The smoothly textured fabric, with its luxe suede feel, is irresistible to touch and works fantastically in the curved crimps of the roman. Soften a dark, plummy by combining it with the tempering oatmeal in a moody master bedroom or living room. Opt for a boldly pattern wallpaper, featuring the plum, and set the blind against this.

products.title: Emperor Mushroom - Roman Blind
products.description: Generate elegance and style by including emperor in mushroom in your dcor, where a silky thread forms a chiffon-like blind with a ribbed effect. The shimmering grey shade will blend with most subdued dcor schemes for a touch comforting texture and dazzling colour. Create a cool and contemporary look in a basic white bedroom by including soothing shades of dove grey and eye-catching silver accessories.

products.title: Real Silk Sand Roman Blind
products.description: Neutral blinds, we love. But when it's teamed with the beauty of a real silk slub, well it has to be one of their favourites. This real silk sand roman blind certainly doesn't shy away from greatness. The shade is softer than gold but has the same level of pizzazz. It's a truly gr neutral blinds, we love.
